translations: n.希腊语的第十九个字母

phrs.translation: 钛星人, 牛磺酸, 蛋白, 牛头
沙头角, 沙头角口岸
客家酿豆腐, 酿豆腐

sentences.sentence: In his animal study, he found even small clumps of the tau protein may disrupt memory.
sentences.translation: 他在动物实验中发现，即使是小块 tau 蛋白质凝结也会扰乱记忆功能。

sentences.sentence: Beta (in the form of beta-amyloid plaques) and tau (in the form of tau tangles) are the physical manifestations of Alzheimer's.
sentences.translation: 贝塔(以贝塔-淀粉样斑块的形式)和陶(以陶蛋白缠结的形式)是痴呆症的物质表征。
